name: A Walk In the Park (Official EaglEYE Games Developers)
name_original: A Walk In the Park (Official EaglEYE Games Developers)
description:
This is a game made entirely by EaglEYE Games.

View our website here: eagleyegames.wixsite.com/home

You are a cube. A simple red cube who has to adventure to 5 (and more coming soon) levels. Show off your parkour skills to your friends! Any issues can be reported at the forum page on the website above!

Credits: 

Achintya Dass (pretty much everything)

Jeremy Blake - Power Up!
